comments.commentBody:
If it is proven that trump was elected through the connivance of the Russians with the campaign, then it is not enough simply to impreach him, but there must be a NEW election with safeguards, such as may be possible, against foreign influence.

It is not enough to remove the head without casting out the limbs.

It's time to make sure our intelligence officers are safe and not exposed. This is more than serious. With this crew from the Trump administration, it's clear these knuckleheads don't even know how to be good liars!! Their sloppiness puts our  intelligence agencies endanger.

Pres. Obama and his administration are heroes of this democracy. Sadly, we need smart, careful, guardians who are constantly vigilant in protecting it. The Russian connections to the Trump campaign are beyond coincidental. Time to get Trump's tax returns and find out more about the business dealings with Russia. Didn't Donald Trump Jr. brag about the money they made in Russia? Follow the money and connect the dots. There IS something to see here.

I am grateful beyond words to President Obama and his administration for furiously searching for the truth, until the very last minute he was in office, and for leaving it where it would be found. This article reads in part like a bread crumb trail to those who have the power to save our nation from Russian influence, now. Now I understand why President Obama looked almost serene while on vacation, while the rest of the country was in turmoil and grappling with an unfit administration. He knew. He knew he had done his work. Thank you President Obama. You may have saved the nation from the foolishness of people in it, who were swindled into handing our country over to a foreign enemy so a handful of people could profit. I believe history is going to judge President Obama as the greatest one in modern times.

The reality is the republicans have no interest in the good of the American people, the Constitution, the Rule of Law or the democracy itself.  They only have interest in the republican party.  They will pay a price for this treason and treason it is.  I fear that the ruskies have much more serious interests and that we face a dilamnia far far more serious then what appears now.  Trump must be impeached and the reason he is impeached makes it impossible for Pence to succeed him.  Pence is part of the ticket that was elected by the Russians.

At the very least, the Democrats should get to stand up during a Trump speech and holler out "You LIE!"
What's good for the goose is good for the gander, right?

My fellow Americans: Please call your legislators today to push for an independent investigation. During high school in the 60s, I did my little part to end the Vietnam War. By the 70s- Watergate investigation- I had given up on political reform. Thank goodness, the Washington Post did not. We can best thank and support the Obama officials, and the newspapers that reported this by keeping up the pressure by calling, writing, and speaking out for disclosure. With effort on our part, the truth will out.

replies.commentBody: you make some points, but you might wanna read everything out there.

comments.commentBody:
Keep up the investigative work New York Times. So the likelihood of the Trump campaign collusion with the Russians has gone from aides to cabinet level with Sessions.

Several questions:
1. Why would Putin favor aiding the Republican Party winning the 2016 election, especially since the Republicans have been focusing on Russia as "the enemy" for decades--even more so than the Democratic Party?

2. Why of all the Republican presidential candidates did Putin decide to favor Trump, and appeared especially delighted when Trump won the primaries? And Trump responds to accusations of Russian hacks by quipping he hopes Russia hacks Hillary's emails? Imagine if Hillary had said that!

But keep going, please: The big fish is The Don! What are the connections between Trump and the Russians? Motive is a big question at this point. What are both sides gaining from this alliance that obviously Trump wants to keep secret?

Does Russia have information on Trump to blackmail him into submission?

Is the connection all about Trump's financial ties with Russian oligarchs?

Or is the connection all about The Oil Men in Russia and the U.S. who stand to benefit by keeping the world hooked on fossil fuels so they can profiteer at the expense of our global health, the environment, and our planet?

A terrible thought: Will Trump fans, the Republican Party, and Wall Street really care if actual collusion and corruption between Trump and Putin is uncovered?
the new york crimes should be charged with treason

It is unfortunate for Sessions that he has never been able to be a believable character in the past.  So today his credibility is more than just a bit suspect.  But he has the Republican 'firewall" protecting him.   Now. it may come to pass that he is revealed for the scoundrel that his is and that "firewall" will disappear into the ether.  But if truth be told, I am not putting any money on it. The Republicans have a lock on the wheels of justice and I do not see anything moving in the right direction.  No pun intended.

replies.commentBody: RICO!  Time for a conspiracy investigation.

comments.commentBody: Extraordinary.  Usually in these espionage cases, one person is implicated.  With Trump, it is his entire inner circle, now the upper echelons of our government.

Someone has got to get to the bottom of this Russian-contact issue. Who, when and why are the important questions. This has been swirling around long enough. Did Trump know and when did he know it? The country can't put up with four years of Russian-contact stories and denials. Either there's evidence that needs to be made public, or the accusations need to end. I want Trump impeached as much as the next person, but I see we're already experiencing Russia burn-out, and pretty soon no one is going to care one way or the other, which is what Trump wants. So, if someone can nail him, then do it and do it quickly.

Provide some actual proof or stop this continuing attack on Pres. Trump and his Administration.  The media seems to be setting the agenda for 4 years of continual inquiries about alleged connections between Trump campaign and Russia.  What is behind this?  To squash any attempt for peace with Russia would be my guess.

Call your Senators and Representatives TODAY to demand a full, independent investigation. They need to hear our voices loud and clear, especially the GOP members of Congress who have been dodging their constituents. Doubtless they are hoping the voters will get distracted between now and next week. I don't plan to get distracted.

A significant question would be why the Russians/Putin would want to have the party that claims credit for forcing the collapse of the USSR running America. What is Putin's endgame?
For decades, Republicans have rallied to have defense spending their first priority citing Russia as the evil empire. (now augmented by ISIS and Al Qaeda). Coupled with the poor and unfair tax policies the Republicans have always promoted, huge government deficits have and will continue to be the result.
The dissolution of the USSR has left a very sour taste in Russia's population and Putin could be trying to force the US into an economic collapse by helping the party into power that has essentially no chance of fixing the soaring debt. Eventually, debt must be paid.
Anyone taking bets that Trump's administration will hit a 2 trillion dollar deficit?

If this way the other way around with Hillary as president and her "associates" involved with Russian "associates" and the Russians had hacked the Republican campaign in order to secure the presidency for her, there would nonstop 24-hour-a-day hearings already in progress.  This situation regarding Trump and his administration has already surpassed the “where there's smoke, there's fire” litmus test.  The republicans are shielding Trump from American justice.  I feel like our government is being held hostage by a gang of thieves.

Thank God for the grown-ups in the Obama Administration.  There's a lot to investigate about Donald Trump, including his income taxes and his ties to Russia.  Very revealing how Jason Chavez, who wanted to indict Hillary Clinton for merely being alive, finds nothing amiss about all the allegations swirling around Donald Trump. Karma is going to get Trump and all the Republicans who were smacking their lips to impugn Hillary while giving themselves a free pass.  The Obama Administration was wise to these guys, and smart to preserve the paper trail.

Perhaps the writers and everyone else should just go watch the movie "zero days" and decide if we should initiate a Geneva convention style discussion about cyberwarfare rules of engagement. I thought this was by far the most compelling point of the film.

Perhaps the American public is smarter than many pundits think, as many of us are aware of the U.S.'s targeted assassinations, coup attempts, and complete falsification of intelligence leading up to the Iraq war.

Please be assured that I absolutely love my country, and am not necessarily vilifying our leadership for engaging what I just mentioned.

I only mention it because I think admitting these things would create an honest framework for discussions about all countries' conduct going forward.

It is also a testament to our democracy that a movie like "zero days" can be made, and the creators are still alive to talk freely about it.

replies.commentBody:
Well, their AG was held in contempt of congress, and they simply poo-poo'd that, so...

Personally, I would wait for hard proof regardless of who was in office, not anonymous sources and unconfirmed (as mentioned in the article) details, but that's just me, I guess...

comments.commentBody:
What would the Republicans be saying if this was a Democratic administration and their Attorney General had lied under oath about contacts with a hostile country's leaders?
Just wondering....

I hope cutting off the head of the snake (Trump) proves to be enough. It may not. It has become clear that the Russian plot involves everyone in his administration, including GOP leadership, and especially including his family. This investigation has to take them all down or the country will still be in peril. Removing Trump is not enough.

Any investigation of this matter should delve into whether Mr. Obama was behind the illegal leaking of highly classified SIGINT in an effort to undermine the incoming administration. The FBI is capable of investigating whether members of the Trump administration have any inappropriate ties to Russia. We don't need the community organizer to actively undercut his successor. That would be a terrible precedent, but one that is entirely in keeping with his character.

I see the New Hysterical Leftist Times is right back to "The Russians are coming" fear and loathing in Trump's America.  Its no surprise that the Times is on the receiving end of all the mostly ambiguous "inside information" spilling out of Obamas leftover loyalists which appear to now be acting as spies and saboteurs for the lefties.
It's the TAX Returns, stupid, the Tax Returns.

Mr. Trump's speech Tuesday evening tells his story and where he wants to lead America. This is consistent with what he stated on the campaign trail. These positions are what got him elected . Alas, there are many in the mainstream media and the left who seem to reject the fact that he was elected. The left's grasping at Russian straws is reminiscent of McArthy's diatribes in the 1950's.

There are still many of Obama's team in the government and they are dedicated to destroying President Trump. I hope that these leakers are exposed and, in the event they are guilty of releasing top secret documents to the public and foreign agents, that they are prosecuted to the full extent of the law. This is a sad case.
I guess the Republicans blew their investigation budget by their selfless, determined, and (God knows) thorough investigation of...wait for it....Benghazi.
